nodes.text: Mirla was a Human female Imperial worker who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. She worked in the Imperial Research Facility on the planet Dantooine known as the Warren. When chaos erupted in the Warren, Mirla's husband, another Imperial worker, was killed. She asked a spacer working as an Imperial operative to discover what happened to her husband.

Mirla was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
